name: Undersion 2
description:
Introducing the Koopa Kingdom's newest project, Undersion MKII. Using cutting-edge genetic engineering and star-powered enhancements, this elite mushroom is sure to defeat Mario once and for all! But first, let's put it to the test.
Swim and dash through 3 levels as you cause carnage, grab coins, and avoid getting ripped apart by the Green Demon.

Controls:
WASD - Move
WASD (double press) - Dash
P - Pause
R - Restart

Credits:
Flarewire - Programming
KrystalPhantasm - Art, Music, Level Design
Nintendo - Maro

Tips:
- To kill a Toad, dash into it.
- Toads aren't required to beat the level, but try to kill all of them if you're looking for a challenge!
- The Green Demon speeds up as you collect coins. Plan your route so that the last coin you collect is close to the star!

Made in 5 days for the MFGG Winter Jam.
